drivers.name: lxm5700m
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

Monochrome driver for the Lexmark 5700. Fast and less memory consuming alternative to the "pbm2l7k" colour driver. You should have it installed when you do not only use your printer for images but also for letters and listings.

notes:
Works with drivers for Lexmark 5700, but the borders are completely off. It starts printing PostScript pages above the upper border of the paper (reported by D. A. M. Revok, cg178 at Freenet dot Carleton dot Ca). So it is not very much usable under free operating systems. Do not buy it.

Consumables/Refills: Color : $40, Photo : $44, Black : $40
